* Contact: TudorHolton
* Brand: Fujitsu
* Make : Lifebook
* Model: P1510D
* Website: <nowiki>[[http://www.fujitsu.com/sg/services/computing/pc/products/notebook/p1510/|http://www.fujitsu.com/sg/services/computing/pc/products/notebook/p1510/]]</nowiki>
* S/N: Only needed if you have a Canonical supplied laptop

=== Current Issues ===
* Special keys next to display don't return keycodes <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/121962|121962]]</nowiki>
* Fingerprint reader doesn't yet work as a scroll wheel <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/121967|121967]]</nowiki>
* Blank display on suspend to RAM - '''FIXABLE''' - see bug <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/122467|122467]]</nowiki>
